parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Defines if the total element count should be computed. ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/odata/concepts/queryoptions-overview#count

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Defines how many elements to skip. ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/odata/concepts/queryoptions-overview#top-and-skip

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Defines how many elements to return. ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/odata/concepts/queryoptions-overview#top-and-skip

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Defines the filtering expression. ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/odata/concepts/queryoptions-overview#filter

parameters.name: $orderBy
parameters.description: Defines the ordering expression. ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/odata/concepts/queryoptions-overview#orderby

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: Defines the Aggregation behavior. ref: http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata-data-aggregation-ext/v4.0/cs01/odata-data-aggregation-ext-v4.0-cs01.html#_Toc378326289
